title: Battle of Valmy
summary: The Battle of Valmy, also known as the Cannonade of Valmy, was the first major victory by the army of France during the Revolutionary Wars that followed the French Revolution. The battle took place on 20 September 1792 as Prussian troops commanded by the Duke of Brunswick attempted to march on Paris. Generals Fran√ßois Kellermann and Charles Dumouriez stopped the advance near the northern village of Valmy in Champagne-Ardenne.
